title: The Digital Infra
description: The website includes functionality for user management, news updates, and role-based permissions to ensure proper access control and user interaction.

title: Truliv
description: Discover your dream apartment, cozy co-living spaces, and perfect holiday homes with Truliv. Explore a wide range of options for your next staycation or getaway.

title: Payrentz
description: E-commerce platform facilitating the rental and purchase of appliances. Led the development and integration of APIs to streamline inventory management and transaction processing.

title: HustleWave
description: HustleWave is a web-based chat application built using Next.js and styled with Tailwind CSS, offering users basic chat features such as real-time messaging, emoji support, and user authentication.

title: SiteInsight
description: Page Speed on Autopilot: Continuous Monitoring & Alerts for Your Site.

title: Material Tracker
description: A material tracking app for managing inventory inputs, outputs, and flows, optimizing resource management and reporting within organizations.

title: Cake Shop
description: Satisfy your sweet cravings with our Cake Shop website. Explore a delightful assortment of cakes, pastries, and desserts for every occasion.

title: FEV Portal
description: Access your daily files securely. Our portal simplifies work by providing personalized login access for all employees.

title: Content Library
description: Explore our website for seamless document management. Upload, view, and download your daily task documents effortlessly, streamlining your work process.

title: Break Management
description: Effortlessly manage your breaks. Our system allows easy logging of break-out and break-in times, ensuring efficient break tracking for all employees.

title: Report Generation
description: Seamlessly generate student progress reports. Input data, and our system automatically produces scores and results, simplifying the reporting process for you.

title: Chat Scripts
description: Facilitate interactive sessions with our chat script. Enable drag-and-drop for quick student responses, ensuring efficient script execution and easy navigation during sessions.
